title.label: Remove Bug Issues Within the Game

content.label:
Hey Horizon Chase team,
 This game is just too awesome. Never seen a game as fluid, engaging, exciting and addictive as this one. Keep it up. Its so cool!! Please include more features to upgrade the various car parts.
There is, however one problem. When I get to the Salvador track in Brazil and I reach position 1 - 3 in each of the 3 races, I am prompted to upgrade my fleet of cars. But when I select the upgrade of my choice, the game freezes and doesn‚Äôt allow me to apply or confirm the selection of my chosen upgrade. It‚Äôs as if there‚Äôs a bug in the game. The same also happens when I go to Cape Town in South Africa. After finishing the game in the required position, the game also prompts me to upgrade my fleet but doesn‚Äôt apply that upgrade to my cars.
 Please fix this problem. I would have given the game 5 stars but I will reserve it for when the game is fixed and the bug removed.
I do hope you will look into this issue.
Thanks.

Update:
Wrote an email to their support team.
They replied saying that they are working on the game.
It‚Äôs almost close to one year now and they are ‚Äústill fixing a bug in the game.‚Äù A Single Bug! This problem, as outlined above, persists on Apple TV, iPad and iPhone. I and many other people have spent money in buying this game, so developers, it‚Äôs not a money issue that you‚Äôre having, it‚Äôs a laziness & negligence issue. Clearly, you‚Äôve abandoned the development of this game. We feel like you took our money and ran. We do not see the full results of what we paid for.
I have downgraded my opinion of you & your game from 4 stars to 1 star.
If it was possible, I‚Äôd rate you 0 stars. üëéüèº
It‚Äôs ok
You can never turn every turn there is you‚Äôll hit a sign and the ai hits you out of nowhere. And when in first the car behind you will spawn in front of you
Works but there is no sound or music no matter what I try! Bugs! On iPhone 11 pro
It is a bad game beacause you start in the back
Still playing version 1.5.5 on Apple TV... No Hawaii cup, no Porto Alegre. Any plans for updating it? The game experience on TV with a controller is much better. It deserves an Apple TV update!

That‚Äôs right! Horizon Chase was never meant for IOS. I play the game on Switch and it is terrific! BTW, nice job with the Retro Mode that you get after you finish the Medium Endurance. Bit hard to play with but it looks sick. Anyways I recently thought up some things that you could add in the next update. 1: Remember the Hot and Cold season for playground? I think we should consider a Hot and Cold update for both Switch and IOS; adding two new cups; the Florida Cup and the Antarctica Cup. (I only said Antarctica Cup because I saw this giant boat dock (or is it a spaceport?) at the bottom of the world.) Also, you could add two new cars that you would get for finishing the cup. I don‚Äôt know WHAT the cars should be so, yea it‚Äôs up to you. Also one more thing; the Long Endurance should be easier to complete(70, 80 tracks long). If you don‚Äôt want to add this, I respect that. 
-Anonymous Horizon Chaser

title.label: Will not allow me to purchase full version of game

content.label:
The app won‚Äôt allow me to purchase the full version and the support email forgot abou or doesn‚Äôt care about my issue. Really like playing the free portion but want to play the rest

Edit: Issue was resolved in the update, thank you for the response
this game is so fun and that‚Äôs it just keeping up the great updates and stuff
Great racing game and a massive trip down memory lane too.

title.label: Worst game ever dont get it

content.label: It‚Äôs is a waste of so much time this game is dumb do not get it please I don‚Äôt know why editors chose this dumb game worst game ever

Load up Carpenter Brut‚Äôs Turbo Killer in the music player or Apple Music then play this game. It goes perfectly with Horizon Chase. The developers out did themselves with this gem. Premium game. Addicting fun. Well worth the cash. I even bought the game on PS4. Thanks!
I play this with a DualShock 4 controller, and it‚Äôs a lot of fun. I bought the premium version. Horizon Chase is challenging without being frustrating. This is great way to pass the time.

Love this game, it wears its influence on its sleeve. Playing this took me back to playing top gear on snes and the cruisn‚Äô series on N64. 

Wish I could turn off the facebook integration option. Id really prefer not see it.
#deletefacebook
I like the game A little bit because the cars don‚Äôt need fuel. Didn‚Äôt you know  it doesn‚Äôt make a fair race.

title.label: Great Update! Just Needs a Few Things!

content.label:
This game is a near perfect port of the version for PS4. There are just a couple of things that need to be fixed or added:

1. 120 FPS support for iPad Pro.
2. The Controller works everywhere except for the Main Menu- is this a bug?
3. In the PS4 version, there is an audible indication when you get all the coins in a track. This would be great to have in this version.

The soundtrack is awesome on the four speaker setup of the iPad Pro! Plus the graphics really pop- this is an addictive game that always keeps you coming back for more. Thanks for offering it at a great price and updating it!

I‚Äôm soo mad at this game! Like it was fun at first then it got harder I been tryna pass this level for over 2 hours now! And everytime I bump into stuff the cars would go pass me! It‚Äôs so annoying make this game have less things to bump into and make the levels EASIER I ENJOYED IT BUT NOT ANYMORE FIX IT!
I love ties game
Fun to play and nostalgic!
Engaging and fun to play. It would be cool to see a road blasters style campaign with weapons.
Belt buckle clicking then goes black screen. Removing game
Why always 20TH !?

Love the app but i just bought it two days ago and will have it completed by the end of the week! Please add the rest of the in-game features soon. I want to play all of the things marked coming soon such as campaigns and challenges. I only have a few cars left to unlock, please hurry. Thanks!
Can anyone get this game to load this is my second time downloading it after 2-3 weeks from the previous time and I still can‚Äôt load in....

This game is very fun, but starts to feel repetitive after a while. It‚Äôs just turn, don‚Äôt get hit, boost if it‚Äôs a straight, turn, don‚Äôt get hit, boost if it‚Äôs a straight. Repeat that about 10 times. The maps could use a bit more background and elements, and that would make this game truly amazing.
Great game!!!
Have enjoyed this racer for a while. Great fun. Looking forward to 2020 updates!

I played this for fun because I used to many years ago and then I was hooked again. I made it to Brazil in one day I was addicted,but I don‚Äôt understand what it means by full game when you get it doesn‚Äôt make a difference it already gives you full game from start right?
‚ÄúAuto Accelerate‚Äù is not engage at the beginning of each game.

title.label: Latest Version Crashes Upon Load - Now Fixed

content.label:
Great game. Fun to play. Latest update has caused the app to crash upon load. Removed and reinstalled the app. Same problem. Dev's lets fix this and do some better testing before releasing new updates. iOS 13.4.1. iPhone 8 Plus.

Update: 4/29/2020 release fixed the crash. Nice turnaround!  Thanks for resolving this issue quickly.
Need for speed horizon chase

Since yesterday‚Äôs update the app won‚Äôt run on my iPhone 11 Pro Max.  What gives?

Edit:  thanks for the quick fix!

Was looking for a decent arcade racer recently (on Steam) and found Horizon Chase Turbo. Was thrilled to find out this existed on iOS. 

Fun game and works with MFI controllers (Gamevice in my case).
The new menu promises lots of new stuff to come!

UPDATE** The game was updated to show fullscreen on my iPad. Latest update also gave it a much nicer appearance overall. I've bought this game for Android, switch, and Apple. Great developers. Kind of wish it could sync the data between all platforms.

ORIGINAL REVIEW* I love this game. I purchased it on Android and was about to purchase it for my iPad as well. But there are black bars on either side of the iPad screen. If it gets updated with proper support I will definitely purchase it.
O love this game, but it worked perfectly for a month and now it crashes every time that I try to open it.. how come?

Another patch, another broken game. Last time it took 2 patches to fix and I lost all my progress. This patch (18) crashes the game immediately after the "clicking seatbelts" animation at launch. This game could be so good but the development team is apparently not able to write and test robust code. I wish I could get my money back on this dog.

The latest patch (17.0.1) has broken my (previously purchased) game. It has a button to restore previous purchase but it doesn't seem to do anything and the game won't let me access any of the unlocked tracks. I have tried to use the contact page but it is in Spanish.

title.label: Do not buy for Apple TV

content.label: I bought the game the month it was launched. Great game, especially if you like Outrun and other simple classic racers. Unfortunately on the Apple TV even if you paid for the full game, it will not unlock the full game and you are always stuck on Demo mode. This has been an issue since 2016 and as of my writing this review is still a problem. I had to lower my rating because of it, otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

title.label: Was Retro fun while it lasted...

content.label: Had to delete game for other upgrades on my iPhone, now I try to play the game once downloading it again‚Äî and get a black screen after the belt buckle animation is done.

title.label: How to be the master of horizon chase?

content.label: If you can complete the full game by getting 100% in every country you will be the master of horizon chase.

The game mechanics is very bad. Paid that you can try for free is a very poor game design for a potencialy great game like horizon chase. All the rest of the game is perfect: sound, graphics, gameplay. But the game design mechanics are really bad and turns the overall playing a not good experience.
I loved the game at first for 11 years but it got glitchy and I hated the game so I discovered other games
